Letter of Undertaking

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_issued, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}
To: {{doc.panel_co_branch}}

Dear Sir/Madam,

Re: Crediting of Hire Purchase (HP) Disbursement through UOB Account via Online


We refer to HP financing provided by your bank to our car buyer.

We would like irrevocably instruct your bank that all the HP disbursement of the loan amount and handling fees to be credited into our UOB via online account no: - 9123006239 in the name of ROHAMAS PRO AUTOSERV SDN BHD

We shall be grateful if you will let us have payment as soon as possible. Your co-operation is highly appreciated.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully,

--------------------------------------------
MOHD FAIRUZ BIN MOHD HAMDAN

Authorised Sales & Service Parts Dealer

Loan Amount: RM {{doc.amount_financed}}

In consideration of our agreeing to my / our request and inducement to release to

ROHAMAS PRO AUTOSERV SDN BHD VIA UOB BANK A/C NO 9123006239. The sum RM {{doc.amount_financed}}
before the issuance of the Vehicle Ownership Certificate (VOC) from the Registration and Inspect of Motor Vehicle,
I/We hereby undertake to refund the said sum to you together with all profit in the event of the following: -

a) The necessary relevant Vehicle Ownership Certificate (VOC) for the above vehicle
is not and/or cannot be issued within seven (7) days from the date hereof, and /


b) The endorsement indicating HONG LEONG ISLAMIC BANK BERHAD's ownership claim
cannot be made or is cannot be issued within seven (7) days from the date hereof, and /


c) The title of the above vehicle is subject to dispute, for any reason whatsoever


We shall be grateful if you will let us have payment as soon as possible. Your co-operation is highly appreciated.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully,

--------------------------------------------
MOHD FAIRUZ BIN MOHD HAMDAN
